html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14922018-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation - The Walt Disney Company (Canada) Ltd. ** Lease Amended **
PrecisOrder Approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION, as landlord, AMEND THE LEASE, with respect to premises located at 250 Front Street West in Toronto, Ontario, with THE WALT DISNEY COMPANY (CANADA), as tenant to: (1) increase the leased space by approximately 26,275 square feet; (2) extend the term of the amended lease by a period of 5 years; (3) apply to the amended lease the same renewal options as apply to the existing lease; and, (4) grant in favour of the Walt Disney Company (Canada) Ltd., the option to lease, subject to acceptance by the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, up to an additional 50% in square footage of the total leased space.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation - The Walt Disney Company (Canada) Ltd. ** Lease Amended **
precis: Order Approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION, as landlord, AMEND THE LEASE, with respect to premises located at 250 Front Street West in Toronto, Ontario, with THE WALT DISNEY COMPANY (CANADA), as tenant to: (1) increase the leased space by approximately 26,275 square feet; (2) extend the term of the amended lease by a period of 5 years; (3) apply to the amended lease the same renewal options as apply to the existing lease; and, (4) grant in favour of the Walt Disney Company (Canada) Ltd., the option to lease, subject to acceptance by the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, up to an additional 50% in square footage of the total leased space.
